column5: We are the Kshins, welcome to our home! Located in the Near Southside, we are 10 min to downtown, TCU, West 7th and the Museum District. A large living space, kitchenette, and sleeping quarters sleeps 4 people with the ability to accommodate up to 6. This rental is attached to our home where we stay with our 2 small children. You may see us playing in the front yard: we'd love to say hello!
